item.title: Run Apache Syncope and Docker
item.description: An introduction on how to run Syncope as a Docker application

item.title: Using 389 Directory Server with Apache Syncope
item.description: 389 Directory Server is an Open Source LDAP server by Fedora, valid alternative to other implementations like as Apache DS, OpenLDAP or OpenDJ: let's see how to install it and use it with Apache Syncope.
